issues.source_span: Hm. Something is haunting the steps of we pilgrims. Tugging at the fringes of our minds, pulling us deep into madness. issues.description: 第一版翻译完全缺失，漏译了整段英文原文。

issues.source_span: Gah! Of course it had to be you bellringer! Wriggling your way up here, making all this racket!<page>Now look at what you’ve done! Activated the old bells, the lot of’em and linked’em!<page>There they go, peeling out their sorrowful song, weakening our monarch, even as she wakes.<hpage>You’d still remain cowled before me, sir? Your family is known to me, and no ordinary bug would dare ascend to this cradle. Don’t you think it’s past time you dropped the act of helpless pilgrim?<page>Gah! Curse you, Old One! Permit a bug their small disguise will ya! It’s been a pleasant thing to play the fool! And I weren’t calling for change, even if you insist on bringing it!<hpage>Change was unavoidable, whether I arrived or not. The monarch stirs. My prescence only accelerates the inevitable.<page>So what is it your hopin to achieve, missy? Planning to usurp, aye? Want to become the new queen above us all, to string us up in your own beastly web? Surely it’s the way of Weavers and gods both...
issues.description: 第一版翻译为空，没有提供任何中文文本，导致英文原文的所有内容、结构标签（如<page>和<hpage>）和信息全部丢失。

overall_comment: 第一版中文翻译完全缺失，未提供任何文本内容，无法评估其准确性、流畅度或结构完整性。这是一个严重的翻译遗漏，玩家将无法获取对话信息。

issues.source_span: Many thanks for freeing me, small spider. It was a careless move, to blundered into those deadly threads.<hpage>You too look a spider, but these ropes suggest you use no silk in your service?<page>Hoi. No! Don’t mistake. I am arachni, sure, but no Weaver, and the better for it! If I could produce silk I’d be fast seized by the Citadel.<page>To weave... Quite a talent, and I’ll not deny some envy, but my weakness means my hide stays safe.<page>It’s no matter really. I’m a fair talent with my vineropes. Trade me a few rosaries and I’ll take you via routes only I’m able to scale.

issues.source_span: Dear Assistant. Loyal, wonderful... Zango... you have done it. Without you... never could we have, so much... transfigured.<page>I need only consume this last... pure blood... To force the reaction. To become a source. For all... For you... May you be eternal...<page>Take my gift, dear Zango. A symbol... of us... Now.... Always. Reach in, deep. Feel the new form that grows within my shell... It is yours. Yours forever...
